description:
Want to try Ethereum 2.0 Topaz Testnet on DAppNode?

Great! That's probably why you are here.

Keep in mind: this is a highly experimental test network with no uptime guarantees.

The Prysm team gladly offer support in their Discord channel, through Github issues, their Gitter channel, and Twitter @prylabs.

Keep in mind that this is only a proof of concept about having an Eth2.0 validator running on DAppNode based on the work of Prysmatic labs.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to protect access to the account manager dashboard. Use a strong password, which you can generate and store with a password manager. You can change this password anytime.
